title: Presence-Based Transformational Learning Design for Nursing Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Leadership Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: A program for nursing managers/leaders in healthcare corporations, constructing immersive learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can execute empathetic connection strategies with patients at 80% or higher accuracy in a simulated environment.
Learners can submit three or more instances of self-reflection and critical thinking patterns derived through weekly reflective journals.
Learners can apply a presence-based approach in team-based projects to achieve a performance score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
